title: A rare hyper-inflammatory syndrome has been reported in teens after COVID vaccination. Why experts aren't worried.
description: The CDC found 21 cases of MIS-C in teens who got at least one dose of the COVID-19 vaccine. Six showed no evidence of prior coronavirus infection.
content:
COVID-19 vaccinations for children ages 5 to 11 have begun across the country. Heres what we know about the risks and side effects.
USA TODAY
